text: Bertrand Blier (14 March 1939 - 20 January 2025) was a French screenwriter and movie director. His 1978 movie Get Out Your Handkerchiefs won the Academy Award for Best Foreign Language Film at the 51st Academy Awards. He was the son of famous French actor Bernard Blier. His 1996 movie Mon Homme was entered into the 46th Berlin International Film Festival. His 2005 film How Much Do You Love Me? was entered into the 28th Moscow International Film Festival where he won the Silver George for Best Director. Blier died at his home in Paris, on 20 January 2025, at the age of 85. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1939 births Category:2025 deaths Category:French screenwriters Category:French movie directors Category:Writers from Boulogne-Billancourt
